column5: Their blind, so Im not worried  Boredom struck me after fishing today, so I decided its time to get back at it. Making some pike and bass flies. Its been years since ive done it, and I dont think I missed a step. The ones I made back then were terrible, being a rookie and all These seem to be a step up and in rough form so far. Eyes to added and some more clipping as well.  Anyhoo, for you fly tiers out there. What do you think? If a fish follows them, then Im happy as can be!
The attack of my key board and finally taming them
I'll take 2!
I'd use those in a heartbeat, they look great  What kind of pike flies can you tie?  Could you take some pics of them?
Nice work Vince    Awesome dude

Thanks, but Im kind of new to it, sort of. Funniest thing was I asked my girls to come down stairs, because I caught 2 baby mice.  Held them in my hand to tease them. they were freaking out , then I told them and showed them how they were made.
Nice flies! But seriously though... time to clean your keyboard or a new one!
Thanks Jacques, its no where near as nice as your works
I like
nice keyboard....  gross lol. Lures look great though!!!!!
I know Kids, food and being in my work shop doesnt help either. Another one is on its way soon and thanks btw guys
It's alright, Vince makes them so realistic.... it's just mouse piss...
My scotsman neighbour says its mouse poop! Wanna argue with him

Very nice looking makes me want to get my fly rod out and try some pike fishing on a fly again I think I may need some new fly line after 15 years of not getting used.  Dont forget to show us the finished product.
Will do Mike, im sure someone will enjoy tossing them in the water

Nice job Vince -- bucket mouths at LPB would probably find those pretty enticing too (hint.. hint) BTW - BPS had some moose mane and a bunch of synthetics, but I didnt see any yak hairs - of course with all those people standing looking it was hard to get a good look - but the moose mane looked like it should do the trick pretty good
Thanks a ton Rick BTW there are hammer handles to target(Hint..Hint) On the fly
I've got my fly rod ready for LPB, couple more weeks!
Nice work Vince! Id love to try them somtime, esp on LPB Rick n Vince...  I promise to get an ipod by then...lol
Nice work Vin ! I had to look twice to make sure they weren't real
